mapPicker.title: Select location
mapPicker.clickToSelect: Click on the map to select location
mapPicker.locationBlocked: Location permission blocked. Select a point manually or enable location.
mapPicker.mapLoadError: Could not load maps. Check your connection or blockers (DNS/AdBlock).
mapPicker.enableLocationIntro: Your browser has blocked geolocation after several rejections. Follow the steps for your platform and then reload:
mapPicker.chromeDesktop: Chrome (Desktop): Click on the settings icon (lock/tune) to the left of the URL ‚Üí Site permissions ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Allow. Reload.
mapPicker.chromeAndroid: Chrome (Android): Lock/tune icon ‚Üí Permissions ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Change to Allow. If still blocked, go to Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí Chrome ‚Üí Permissions ‚Üí Location. Reload.
mapPicker.edge: Edge: Lock icon ‚Üí Site permissions ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Allow. Reload.
mapPicker.safariIos: Safari (iOS): System Settings ‚Üí Safari ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Ask or Allow. Then open the page and accept the prompt.
mapPicker.firefox: Firefox: Lock icon ‚Üí Permissions ‚Üí Location ‚Üí Allow.
mapPicker.chromeReset: Chrome general reset: chrome://settings/content/location ‚Üí Clear blocks and add your domain to "Allowed".
mapPicker.afterEnabling: After enabling permission you can use "Use my location" or reload to center the map automatically.
